text: James Tray (February 14, 1860– July 28, 1905) was a Major League Baseball catcher for the 1884 Indianapolis Hoosiers. He played in the minors through 1889. ==External links== *Baseball-Reference page Category:1860 births Category:1905 deaths Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Baseball players from Michigan Category:Major League Baseball catchers Category:Major League Baseball first basemen Category:Indianapolis Hoosiers (AA) players Category:Bay City (minor league baseball) players Category:Saginaw Greys players Category:Birmingham (minor league baseball) players Category:St. Paul Freezers players Category:Kalamazoo Kazoos players Category:Jackson Jaxons players
title: Jim Tray
